gw.transaction

Class DataConflictException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
            • gw.transaction.DataConflictException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasErrorInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class DataConflictException
extends com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
    Thrown when there is a possibility of a lost update occurring due to one or more beans in a Bundle having data that is in conflict with data in the database.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
